body: Hi, I used to play avicus over a year ago and I played on a terrible laptop at like 20 fps :/. I got a gaming pc about 4 months ago that runs at 500 fps average but as you can imagine my K/D was still trash. Is there any way to reset my K/D like asking a manager or something? I'm actually good at pvp now...
body_tagged: Hi, I used to play avicus over a year ago and I played on a terrible laptop at like 20 fps :/. I got a gaming pc about 4 months ago that runs at 500 fps average but as you can imagine my K/D was still trash. Is there any way to reset my K/D like asking a manager or something? I'm actually good at pvp now...
title: Any way to reset K/D?

replies.body:
You can't reset your K/D, like literally you physically cannot because it's not a thing here.

I don't know why you would be so asshurt about your K/D though, because you're banned at the moment so..
replies.body_tagged:
You can't reset your K/D, like literally you physically cannot because it's not a thing here.

I don't know why you would be so asshurt about your K/D though, because you're banned at the moment so..

replies.body: Unfortunately there is no way to reset your KD, as a solution just deal with it like everyone else.
replies.body_tagged: Unfortunately there is no way to reset your KD, as a solution just deal with it like everyone else.

replies.body:
Sorry to say, there's no way to reset your K/D to 0.0
You're best bet is to work your way up and working hard for a good K/D
will feel better when you really work for it, after all, the trip is better 
than the destination x)

As snow stated above, you are currently banned, so I recommend appealing first before you
start worrying about your KD :/

replies.body:
My PvP kd was 1.22 before I learnt PvP :^)

Not that it matters, but yea you can't reset it

replies.body: banned twice for hacking...didn't have much trouble hacking on that laptop did ya?
